articles.title: All Americans Eligible For Covid Vaccine, Biden To Announce Today - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden will announce Tuesday that all adults across the United States will be eligible for Covid-19 vaccines by April 19 -- well ahead of the already ambitious previous target.
articles.content:
If the target is met, this would mean an end to restrictions by age, health issues or other categories.

articles.title: Amended return may be needed to get full refund on $10,200 unemployment tax break, IRS says - CNBC
articles.description: Americans who collected unemployment benefits last year may need to file an amended tax return in some cases to get their maximum tax refund, the IRS said.
articles.content:
The IRS is automatically recalculating and refunding money to Americans who filed their tax returns without claiming a new tax break on unemployment benefits.
